ygData.subject: Re: Quest Help(riverdale)
ygData.msgSnippet: Just a side note on that: the ring can be recharged at any cleric guild.. I ve recharged it in Ak anon and Freeport before.. But i do agree, the ring isnt very
ygData.messageBody:
Just a side note on that: the ring can be recharged at any cleric guild.. I've recharged it in Ak'anon and Freeport before.. But i do agree, the ring isnt very useful, not as good as it was in beta anyway.

Wes Lobdell,
Quote: +ACI-The certain proof that intelligent life exists elsewhere in the universe
is that no one has bothered to make contact with us.+ACI-

-----Original Message-----
From: kurt walther itzkurt+AEA-wans.net
To: EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com
Date: Saturday, July 03, 1999 11:04 AM
Subject: Re: +AFs-EQCheats+AF0- Quest Help(riverdale)


From: kurt walther itzkurt+AEA-wans.net

Ok.. first off.. I'm very picky about the name of the town. Rivervale
not riverdale. Hehe.. just one of those little things that ticks me
off. Next.. the squad ring is useless once you leave the zones
surrounding rivervale. It still works but with only one charge it's not
very economical to run back to vale everytime to get it recharged. Kill
mooto more to get the ring. He gives the most faction. Nillipuss is
about lvl 17.
